documents.document: A year ago me and @GeorgiaDee1996 were in Rome. How fast a year has been! What a great trip that was 🍕🍷#ITALIA https://t.co/AQuGvBtkSn
@WelshRugbyUnion @DoveMen @ITVRugby @thepaulwilliams @simonrug who was awarded MOTM?
Who was man of the match?
Never mind, top of the table after the first week of #6nations2017
That 4th try and bonus point would've been nice.
So bloody close!
Did Jon Davies and Liam Williams celebrate their tries with 'salt bae' 😅
#Fox
Sam Davies will hopefully speed things up though.
No pressure in the 2nd half Wales. But you need to step it up.
So Italy aren't commiting men to the ruck area and keeping a line. So why don't we kick ball through and get them on the back foot.
The Italians are shooting off the line. Offside most of the time.
@Joshuacrew18 I'd probably end up crying 😂
Do it for Elliot boys 🖒 https://t.co/CLqox4c9TW
Imagine the huddle with Alun Wyn Jones giving the speech! 🔥🔥🔥👀
There's an advert break every 10 seconds on ITV. So boring when they're trying to build up the rugby.
Much rather watching Wales on BBC than ITV. It's just not the same.
GWAN WAYALS! (Every valleys woman in a few hours.)
6 pints last night and I've got a thick head this morning. Dry January changed me! 😂
@josh_king123 @KristianJ92 I'm sure you stile that line off me Josh. Except you tweaked it a little 😂
Ringing work to tell them I've been overpaid. #Honest
@Callum92 Jesus christ we get it. You're watching question time.
Instead of work today. I'd rather stay in my pj's and watch wrestling from the late 90's/early 2000's. Now that tru… https://t.co/zga0y9dgoo
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #WALvENG RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/ExbQnEOULM
Unless Wales had drastically changed over night- we know what's coming out way Sunday afternoon 🖒
So all the hype over Wales' new players. Italy was the perfect game to let them have a run around. Not one of them in the 23. #SameOld
That welsh team is... OBVIOUS.
It's been a month since me and @GeorgiaDee1996 got drunk last. We completed dry January 😃 We didn't have any pizza… https://t.co/3G0N3f69wi
Not many caps in that starting Italian XV. Good for O'Shea for being ballsy 🖒
@KristianJ92 It's still not right though- getting in the 4th officials face and screaming.
@KristianJ92 Well Swansea beat them so that's awkward...
He should get a ban or a fine for that.
Klopps reaction to that penalty save is what's wrong with football. So disrespectful.
@KristianJ92 In all fairness to him, he's done what he promised before the election. Not politicians keep promises.
@KristianJ92 Well he is a politician....
@KristianJ92 Well when you see some individuals commenting- who I've never seen post about or mention politics before. It makes you think.
Didn't know how many people were secret politicians! Or are people just jumping on the anti-Trump bandwagon.... 🤔
Can't wait to see Donald Trump lift the ban because 200 people in Bangor disagree. #MuslimBan
Dragons played on this and Pentyrch still cancelled on us @trePhoenix! #DidntWantIt https://t.co/mUOS7kh2FD
That'll be an exciting watch..... https://t.co/A3PN2ndp9x
Just what I wanted on this beautiful Sunday morning. My car won't turn on. RAC are on the way 🖒
Games off again this week. Getting boring now! 😴😴😴 2 weeks in a row!
It's nice to see @Starbucks have the Welsh language option on the menu in Llanishen. I've not seen that before so well done 👏😃
Finally! Someone else agrees it's overrated. https://t.co/7zISr0HhaB
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #WALvENG RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/mB5erfJSKY
I'm on my way home and people are off to work. I do feel sorry for you- honestly. https://t.co/W2VJz9FiJ4
Not a fan of that CINDY girl @470Crossfit. #HardWork https://t.co/ibjP5SvCPj
For the past 8 hours. But finally, I'm home! 🏠😭😃 https://t.co/YO9qIcwW18
Stopped in traffic lights, bloke in front of me opens his door, spews and drives off 🖒 #Merthyr 🚦
You know what I'm really looking forward to...? Leaving for work in 10 mins and being up until 6am tomorrow morning 🖒😃
It's nice to see my mam on the settee struggling with a hangover. It's like a revenge I've been waiting for. I might even hoover the house 🖒
From never doing a split jerk before to doing 70kg first time today- I'll take that 🖒
Sunday morning ❌fit with @GeorgiaDee1996 💪🏋
American woman on Sky News: "He's not our president!" Well love, he is 🖒 #Donald
Half chicken, 3 chicken wings, mash and peas in #Nandos. Came to £4.80 👌🔥
6th day of work in a row. Roll on 1pm 😴
France are 40/1 for the grandslam. That's a tenner on right there.
@josh_king123 He's probably way different in the changing rooms to what you see him like at media sessions.
@josh_king123 What do you mean?
Alex Cuthbert is in the squad like 😂
@GeorgiaDee1996 Shut up you dull head 😙 The cooking part on the other hand 🖒
2 (maybe 3) more sleeps and this pearler is back home for abit ❤ @GeorgiaDee1996 https://t.co/NUTrtUbcI6
Heads banging. Sinuses killing. Ears feel blocked. Feel like I'm overheating too. Can't wait to wake up at 5am for… https://t.co/fyI7ndkPHB
At work.... #JustThinkOfTheMoney
Bet on Cardiff and they let me down. Bet against them and they let me down! #JinxTeam
Checked my bets before my shower. Cardiff losing 1-0, ok cool I need that result. Come back and it's 2-2 😥
Still haven't had that phonecll saying it's snowing so you best finish work early. Looks like I'm here til 10 then.... 😐
No lie in tomorrow morning. Up for 6am and crossfit at 6:30 🖒

@TheWelshDragon9 We're going backwards if he is
I love how unpredictable the #BDO is. What will they hit? A 60? 15? Or even a 3?! Quality trebles on display! #Arrows
@simonrug @_ThomasYoung @WalesRugby Owen Williams went to St.Johns Simon.
Work is dragging today. 2.5 hours left though. #GlassHalfFull
One positive of afternoons- a lie in 😃
It's winter yet my house is so hot (my mams obsessed with the heating being on) that I'm actually sweating and uncomfortable 😣
@stuartcaie @SkyBet Great. Didn't want that news 😂 Cheers though.
@SkyBet any chance on the latest Afogados Ingazeira PE v Flamengo Arcoverde PE score? There's no live scores available.
As great as a servant Warburton has been to Welsh Rugby. What has he done to deserve his place? Tipuric+Young showing they can do the job.
For the 6 Nations. I'd happily see Warburton dropped and put Thomas Young in. Warburtons place isn't cemented anymore.
@470Crossfit Roll on Thursday morning!
@KristianJ92 I was going straight down instead of going down with my hips first and I was holding the bar too wide. Bigger strain on knees
After just 1 crossfit session, turns out I've been squatting wrong for a couple of years🖒 Fundementals are key! @470Crossfit 🏋
The new #FastAndFurious film trailer doesn't even look like a Fast and Furious film. Call it an end boys. Out of id… https://t.co/dX2g26AA1P

So many people are going to be diving for the line if they're 2metres out now. With these new laws you basically can't be touched.
Me every morning this week! Never mind, last one tomorrow 😃 https://t.co/GqsWtMeGFM
Manu Tuilagi is the most, if not, the most operated player in world rugby. He's riddled with injuries- yet people adore him off 20odd caps?🤔
Nothing funnier than seeing people argue in work 😂
I can see why people move abroad. Waking up at 5am, being cold and shattered is not what I call a fun start to the day ahead.
The one problem after Christmas holidays... I really want a pint 😂
@Owenins @robindavey01 I think some will Owen. But the old school and die hards never will. So it's a mix. But I'd say most wouldn't.
Howley should just man-up, select in form players and scrap Gatlands Law to bring boys playing in Prem- Young and Williams mainly.
Then we'll have a terrible 6 Nations and nothing will change. We'll all argue about how talent should've been used and how we're too boring🖒
They'll select a few young boys for the 37 man squad. Then on match day, none of them will be included- starting XV or bench.
I don't understand why media even bother creating the 'young Welsh talent for 6 Nations' articles. We all know the team ready. #SameOld
As low standard as the #BDO is, I'll always get excited to watch it every year 😂 #Wolfy
One more day off is what I need. Not looking forward to 6:45 tomorrow morning 😭
@KristianJ92 @josh_king123 Yeah same one as Josh butt. #MerthyrExpress
